build: bash -c "if [ ! -f config/jwt/private.pem ]; then mkdir -p config/jwt && openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -out config/jwt/private.pem -aes256 -pass pass:\"$JWT_PASSPHRASE\" -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:4096 && openssl rsa -pubout -in config/jwt/private.pem -out config/jwt/public.pem -passin pass:\"$JWT_PASSPHRASE\"; fi"
